titleStmt.title: Christ exalted above all creatures by God his Father or A sermon preached before the Right Honourable, the Parliament of the Commonwealth of England. (At their solemne fast, observed the last day of the last month called February 1649.) By Vavasor Povvell.
titleStmt.author: Powell, Vavasor, 1617-1670.

titleStmt.title: Christ exalted above all creatures by God his Father or A sermon preached before the Right Honourable, the Parliament of the Commonwealth of England. (At their solemne fast, observed the last day of the last month called February 1649.) By Vavasor Povvell.
titleStmt.author: Powell, Vavasor, 1617-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Ibbitson for Livewell Chapman at the Crown in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Intended to be appended to "Saving faith set forth in three dialogues" (Wing, 2nd ed., P3092), which has a separate dated title page and separated register and pagination.
Annotation on Thomason copy of "Saving faith set forth in three dialogues", with which this is bound: "march 2.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
